segments.text: Thank you for coming to see me off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If have time , I'll come again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your hospitality . I hope I didn't cause you too much trouble during my stay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I have to go now . The plane will take off soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Call us as soon as you get home .
segments.speaker: S2
